posts.post_content:
I will gladly pay $2,500+ for ANY signed T206 card that is not already in my collection, which can be viewed at [url]www.T206Collector.com[/url].  Known examples that I am missing include the list below.  Autograph must pass muster with JSA, PSA/DNA and/or SGC.  

Email me at [url]SignedT206@gmail.com[/url] if you've got anything to share.  Even if you just know the whereabouts of any of these, I'd appreciate the tip!

Thanks for looking!

Paul



Bresnahan Batting
Cobb Red
Cobb Green
Cobb Bat On
Speaker
Chance Yellow (though I've always doubted this one given Chance's date of death)
Lajoie (Batting)
Clarke (Portrait)
Cicotte
Phillippe
Walsh
Donie Bush (should be more common but isn't for some reason)
Cravath
Lobert (should be more common but isn't for some reason)
Rucker (Throwing)
Wilstse (Portrait)
Zimmerman
Boss Schmidt (Net54 member claims ownership, but never produced scan)
Oscar Stanage (Net54 member claims ownership, but never produced scan)
George Moriarity (Net54 member claims ownership, but never produced scan)
